name: Escape From Area 51 (Goose)
description:
You are a programmer, and you have to help a robot to escape the Area 51 lab.

How To Play

You need to program the robot by sequencing the command steps. You have to give at least 5 command steps and maximum at 14 command steps.

NOTE: Me and my friends made this game only to complete lecture assignments of serious game at college.
